SQL.LOAD: SELECT ca.claim_authorization_id, ca.claim_id, ca.authorization_number, ca.service_center_id, ca.service_level_id, ca.claim_authorization_status_id, ca.special_instruction, ca.visit_date, ca.device_reception_date, ca.expected_repair_date, ca.repair_date, ca.pick_up_date, ca.delivery_date, ca.who_pays_id, ca.defect_reason, ca.technical_report, ca.batch_number, ca.svc_reference_number, ca.external_created_date, ca.is_special_service_id, ca.problem_found, ca.source, ca.reverse_logistics_id, ca.contains_deductible_id, ca.created_by, ca.created_date, ca.modified_by, ca.modified_date, ca.verification_number, ca.auth_fulfillment_type_xcd, ca.cash_pymt_method_xcd, ca.sub_status_reason, ca.linked_claim_auth_id, ca.sub_status_xcd, ca.auth_type_xcd, ca.party_type_xcd, ca.party_reference_id, (select li.code from elp_claim_auth_item cai join elp_list_item li on li.list_item_id = cai.service_class_id where cai.claim_authorization_id = ca.claim_authorization_id and code in ('REPAIR','REPLACEMENT') and rownum = 1 ) as service_order_Type, (select sum(cai.amount) from elp_claim_auth_item cai where cai.claim_authorization_id = ca.claim_authorization_id) as authorization_amount, ca.locator, getitemcodefromextendedcode(ca.refund_method_xcd) as refund_method_xcd, (select nvl(u.user_name, 'ELITA') from elp_user u where u.network_id = ca.created_by) as refund_created_by, elp_utl_lov.Description(ca.claim_authorization_status_id) as refund_authorization_status FROM elp_claim_authorization ca WHERE ca.claim_authorization_id = hextoraw(:claim_authorization_id)
